page.title: 09THE CORNER SHOP,BROUGHTON
page.content: ON FRIDAY, 28th JUNE WE INTERVIEWED THE NEW OWNER OF THE CORNER SHOP.HE HAS WORKED IN OTHER SHOPS LIKE NEWSAGENTS, GROCERIES AND CONFECTIONERY SHOPS.A LADY OWNED THE SHOP BEFORE THE PRESENT OWNER AND HIS WIFE.THE NEW OWNER DOES NOT LIKE MUCH ABOUT HIS JOB.HE HAS HAD THE SHOP FOR FIVE AND A HALF MONTHS.IT OPENS AT 8.00a.m. AND CLOSES AT 9.00p.m.EXCEPT SUNDAY,WHEN IT OPENS AT 9a.m.IT IS OPEN EVERY DAY OF THE YEAR EXCEPT CHRISTMAS DAY.THEY SELL LOTS OF EVERYTHING. THE BUSIEST DAY IS SUNDAY BECAUSE THE OTHER SHOPS ARE CLOSED.THE LEAST BUSY DAY IS WEDNESDAY BECAUSE MANY CUSTOMERS ARE PAID ON THURSDAY SO THEY HAVE NOT GOT MUCH MONEY LEFT BY WEDNESDAY.THE WORST PROBLEMS ARE: SHOPLIFTING AND OLD PEOPLE BEING FUSSY.THE ITEMS THAT ARE STOLEN MOST ARE SWEETS AND CHOCOLATE.
